description: These gorgeous little bruschettas have a herby flavour. Adding lemon juice and zest brings out the tastes of summer.
keywords: Bruschetta & crostini,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Courgette & Saffron Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp olive oil, save 1 tsp to drizzle

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat griddle or grill. Slice the baguette thinly on an angle, drizzle with olive oil, and grill until crisp on both sides.
Use one garlic clove to rub gently over the crisp bread.
Dice the courgettes and chop the other garlic clove finely. Heat a little oil in a pan and sauté courgette and garlic for 5 minutes.

Add a pinch of saffron and cook until vegetables start to turn golden. Add 1 tbs lemon juice or more to taste, the season and use to top the crisp bruschetta. Garnish with lemon zest and basil leaves scattered over.
